name: Commander Keen 2: The Earth Explodes

write_file.content:
[cpu]
cputype=386_slow
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
cd keen2
keen2.EXE

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the file Keen2.exe
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/commander_keen.conf
installer:
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/HDD/keen2
    file: mkdir
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      cp -avr "$src_path/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR/HDD/keen2
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- write_file:
    content: '[cpu]

      cputype=386_slow

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      cd keen2

      keen2.EXE

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/commander_keen.conf
